other_title: Mobile Police Patlabor: The New Files

opening_theme: #1: "Condition Green ~Kinkyu Hasshin~ (コンディション・グリーン~緊急発進~)" by Hiroko Kasahara (eps 1, 2, 5, 6)

#2: "My Pace 〜My Way My Pace〜 (マイペース〜My Way My Pace〜)" by Miina Tominaga (eps 5-9)

#5: "Wings to the Dream" by Kawai Kenji (ep 16)
